Package io.wcm.caravan.rhyme.api.resources

Interface EmbeddableResource

  • @ConsumerType
public interface EmbeddableResource
    An interface that server-side resources should implement if it's reasonable to embed them into the context resource.

    For each related resource that implements this interface, isEmbedded() will be called (when the resource is rendered) to determine whether to embed the resource. It's up to the resource implementation to either decide this on its own (e.g. depending on the amount of content), or also provide a setter so that other resources can decide this after creating a resource instance to which they are linking to.

    You shouldn't make your interfaces annotated with HalApiInterface extend this interface (since it's only being used server-side, and clients shouldn't need to know whether a resource is embedded or linked).

    See Also:
    LinkableResource, HalApiInterface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      default boolean isEmbedded()
      Determines if this resource should be embedded (rather than just linked to) from the context resource that created the resource implementation instance
      default boolean isLinkedWhenEmbedded()
      Determines if this resource should also be linked when it's already embedded in its context resource

    • Method Detail

      • isEmbedded

        default boolean isEmbedded()
        Determines if this resource should be embedded (rather than just linked to) from the context resource that created the resource implementation instance
        Returns:
        true if this resource should be embedded

      • isLinkedWhenEmbedded

        default boolean isLinkedWhenEmbedded()
        Determines if this resource should also be linked when it's already embedded in its context resource
        Returns:
        true if links to the embedded resources should be included
